public static void EditRestaurantProfile(String newrestaddress,String newphone,String newrestinfo,String owner_id){
	PreparedStatement stmt = null;
	currentCon = ConnectionManager.getConnection();
	String updateQuery = "update restaurants set rest_info=?,rest_address=?, rest_phone=? where owner_id =?";
			
	try {
		stmt = currentCon.prepareStatement(updateQuery);
	} catch (SQLException e1) {
		// TODO Auto-generated catch block
		e1.printStackTrace();
	}
	try {
		stmt.setString(1,newrestinfo);
		stmt.setString(2,newrestaddress);
		stmt.setString(3, newphone);
		stmt.setString(4, owner_id );
		
		stmt.executeUpdate();
	} catch (SQLException e) {
		// TODO Auto-generated catch block
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
	
}
